name: Shawerma Platter
ingredients: Marinated chicken or lamb, hummus, baba ghanoush, rice, pita bread, salad
description: A feast of grilled meats, savory dips, fluffy rice, and fresh salad.

name: Man'oushe Za'atar
ingredients: Flatbread, olive oil, za'atar spice blend, sesame seeds
description: Simple yet flavorful flatbread topped with aromatic za'atar and olive oil.

name: Muhammara
ingredients: Roasted red peppers, walnuts, breadcrumbs, pomegranate molasses, garlic, olive oil
description: Spicy and smoky dip made with roasted peppers, walnuts, and pomegranate molasses.

name: Lentil Soup
ingredients: Lentils, vegetables, spices, lemon juice
description: Hearty and warming soup made with lentils, vegetables, and aromatic spices.

name: Chicken Biryani
ingredients: Basmati rice, chicken, spices, nuts, raisins
description: Fragrant rice dish with flavorful chicken, spices, nuts, and raisins.

name: Moussaka
ingredients: Eggplant, ground lamb, béchamel sauce, spices
description: Layered dish of eggplant, ground meat, and creamy béchamel sauce.

name: Tabbouleh Salad
ingredients: Bulgur wheat, parsley, tomatoes, mint, onion, lemon juice, olive oil
description: Refreshing and healthy salad with bulgur wheat, fresh herbs, and lemon dressing.

name: Fattoush Salad
ingredients: Mixed greens, toasted pita bread, tomatoes, cucumber, onion, radish, mint, lemon juice, olive oil
description: Hearty salad with mixed greens, crispy pita bread, and a tangy lemon dressing.

name: Dolmades
ingredients: Grape leaves, stuffed with rice, herbs, and spices
description: Delicate grape leaves stuffed with savory rice, herbs, and spices.

name: Knafeh
ingredients: Pastry dough, cheese, syrup, rosewater
description: Sweet and cheesy pastry soaked in syrup and rosewater, a decadent dessert.

name: Loukoum (Turkish Delight)
ingredients: Gelatin, sugar, rosewater, pistachios
description: Sweet and chewy confection flavored with rosewater and dusted with pistachios.

name: Mint Tea
ingredients: Fresh mint leaves, hot water, sugar (optional)
description: Refreshing and aromatic tea with a calming effect.

name: Shish Taouk
ingredients: Marinated chicken skewers grilled to perfection
description: Juicy and flavorful chicken skewers, a classic Middle Eastern dish.

name: Mujadara
ingredients: Lentils, rice, caramelized onions, spices
description: Comforting dish of lentils and rice with caramelized onions and spices.

name: Sambusek
ingredients: Fried or baked pastries filled with savory ingredients like meat, vegetables, or cheese
description: Crispy and flavorful pastries with various fillings, perfect for appetizers.

name: Shakshuka
ingredients: Eggs poached in a spicy tomato sauce
description: Flavorful and satisfying breakfast dish with eggs poached in a spicy tomato sauce.

name: Baba Ganoush
ingredients: Roasted eggplant puree with tahini, olive oil, lemon juice, and spices
description: Smoky and flavorful eggplant dip, perfect for dipping with pita bread.

name: Baklava Cheesecake
ingredients: Cheesecake base topped with crumbled baklava and drizzled with honey
description: Unique and decadent dessert combining the creaminess of cheesecake with the flaky sweetness of baklava.

name: Turkish Delight Ice Cream
ingredients: Ice cream infused with rosewater and studded with pieces of Turkish Delight
description: Refreshing and flavorful ice cream with a unique rosewater and Turkish Delight twist.

name: Hibiscus Tea
ingredients: Brewed hibiscus flowers, sugar (optional)
description: Bright and tart tea with a beautiful ruby red color, rich in antioxidants.
